command.label: Command
command.tooltip: The Command to display a gif.

delay.label: Duration of displayed gifs
delay.tooltip: The Duration for how long the gifs should be displayed

scene.label: GIF Scene Name
scene.tooltip: The Name of Your Scene, where all your gifs are in SLOBS

notlast.label: Exclude Last Gif
notlast.tooltip: Exclude the last two played gifs from selection for next gif.

programm.label: Streaming Program
programm.tooltip: Choose the Streaming Program you use.
